pkgmetadata.longdescription: UK National River Flow Archive Data from R // Utility functions to retrieve data from the UK National River Flow Archive (https://nrfa.ceh.ac.uk/, terms and conditions: https://nrfa.ceh.ac.uk/costs-terms-and-conditions). The package contains R wrappers to the UK NRFA data temporary-API. There are functions to retrieve stations falling in a bounding box, to generate a map and extracting time series and general information. The package is fully described in Vitolo et al (2016) "rnrfa: An R package to Retrieve, Filter and Visualize Data from the UK National River Flow Archive" https://journal.r -project.org/archive/2016/RJ-2016-036/RJ-2016-036.pdf.
